tweets.text:
Important new research out today by @Jamie_Woodward_ & others identifies water firms as the main source of microplastics in UK rivers. 

Builds more pressure on government @EnvAgency to tackle the way water firms release untreated effluent into our rivers.
https://t.co/HKK1Ar0abP

urls.title: Water firms are main source of microplastics in UK rivers, study says
urls.description: Research says discharge of untreated sewage and wastewater during dry spells to blame

tweets.text:
This week is #MentalHealthAwarenessWeek & to mark this we want to give our customers the opportunity to attend a free online course in Stress and Resilience.

All you need is a computer or phone with a camera and microphone. Sign up using our online form: https://t.co/ImMUqrLP1T https://t.co/BCOu5oD68J

tweets.text:
@JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency Try going outside in Newcastle under Lyme.  

Deciding whether it is safe or not is mental torture.  

Get Walleys quarry landfill sorted out please?  

#StopTheStink

@RobGMacfarlane @Jamie_Woodward_ @EnvAgency Let's get real here. Water companies don't put those microplastics in the sewage they have to treat. It's us. All of us. Just chucking whatever we fancy down the drain.

They'd happily attempt to put in whatever treatment is needed to remove them, but we'd have to pay.

On #NationalStaffNetworksDay I want to celebrate and thank @EnvAgency networks for their tireless support and strength during the last year. 

Our culture of inclusion is nurtured by the diverse voices of our staff network volunteers. Consider joining if you have not already. https://t.co/M46k2505Q2
@davemh72 @SOPH_C_ @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe 100% in agreement with you. In fact I can't trust anyone of these involved in this matter.
üëèüèª@AaronBell4NUL absolutely lamentable response over a long period from @EnvAgencyMids this goes right to the top of that organisation. @StinkStopthe https://t.co/kPOFXOlFbz

@ClareNicklin @DrMickSalt @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids By law each loaded lorry has to have a consignment note with date, where the load came from and what the load consists of. The driver has to obtain a signature when loading and off loading the waste.

@JamesBevanEA @samaritans This post doesn't mean a thing when there are thousands of people suffering not only physical health issues but mental health issues due to Walleys quarry ltd formerly known as @RedIndustries2 we are suffering.
#StopTheStink @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids

The @EnvAgency turned a blind eye to what‚Äôs been going there for a long time & have never had control. Glad @AaronBell4NUL is taking this to 30 minute debate in @HouseofCommons next week- only option is for governmental action now @MattHancock @MPGeorgeEustice #stopthestink https://t.co/3MTMF7AgD4
